Clearbold helps agency & corporate teams, small businesses, and non-profits launch successful and sustainable websites, email campaigns, and data-driven projects. Get a quote.

Services

Custom Craft CMS Development

Making a great content management system even better with custom plugins and website support.

Craft Commerce Development

Empowering e‑commerce with the affordability, flexibility, and features only Craft Commerce can offer.

Salesforce Support

Steady support for your Salesforce Admin & Developer needs.

Custom Web Applications

Data-driven tools supporting Citizen Science projects, CRM integrations, and everything in‑between.

Interactive Maps & Data Visualization

Harnessing digital maps and your data to tell compelling visual stories. Read case studies in an NTEN.org article.

Website Redesigns & Content Management

Helping you evolve, optimize, and manage your most important marketing tool.

Email Marketing & Automation

Leveraging a powerful, permission-based platform to engage customers and communities.

Hello! I’m Mark Reeves. I describe myself as a general contractor for website, web application, and email projects. I’ve worked with a wide array of technologies, industries, and applications for over 20 years, and can help you scope, budget for, and realize your project goals on time and on budget. I support many projects directly, from interaction design through development and launch. On larger projects I can pull together a team with specialized skillsets and serve as hands-on project manager. I’ve supported clients remotely for over a decade via Clearbold, LLC.
